answers.answer: Hi,The only way toknow if you have diabetes is to get your blood sugar tested.The tests to do would be fasting blood glucose and Hba1c, which is a measure of average blood sugar over the past 3 or so months.
If you have diabetes, Fungal infections love sugar.  How are your BG (blood sugar) numbers?  treating the infection is one thing, if you dont treat your BG the infection will return.
